name: SEA\LNG LIMITED
goal: SEA\LNG is a multi-sector industry coalition, created to accelerate the widespread adoption of liquefied natural gas (LNG) as a marine fuel. Our vision is of a competitive global LNG value chain for cleaner maritime shipping by 2020
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Transport
euInitiatives: Our interest is in the activities of the Committees on Transport and Tourism, Environment, Industry, Research and Energy
